section.title: Present simple negative and question forms: he and she
section.sectiontitle: In the negative, we use he/she/it + does not + verb. We usually use the short form.
section.text2: My cat does not like dogs.
section.sectiontitle2: In the question, we use does + he/she/it + verb.
section.text3a: Does she live with you? Yes, she does.
section.text4: It doesn't rain a lot in Egypt.
section.text4a: Does it rain a lot in Egypt? No, it doesn't.
